summary: This bill (H.R. 1056) aims to include the Czech Republic in the list of countries whose nationals are eligible for E1 nonimmigrant visas, allowing them to trade or invest in the United States. The bill stipulates that this inclusion is contingent upon the Czech Republic providing similar nonimmigrant status to U.S. nationals. The bill was introduced in the House of Representatives on February 6, 2025, and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
